long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Password Generator Chrome Extension
This Password Generator Chrome extension allows users to easily generate secure and customizable passwords based on a range of criteria. It's designed with a user-friendly interface and features options for generating strong, random passwords that can include uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

Key Features:
Customizable Password Length: Users can adjust the password length with a slider, ranging from 4 to 32 characters.

Character Type Selection: Users can select which character types they want to include in the generated password:

Uppercase letters (A-Z)
Lowercase letters (a-z)
Numbers (0-9)
Special characters (!@#$%^&*()_+-=[]{}|;:,.<>?/~)
Custom Special Characters: If enabled, users can enter their own set of special characters to be included in the password. This ensures that passwords can be personalized to meet specific security requirements.

Password Generation: The extension generates a secure, random password based on the user's selected criteria. It also ensures that at least one special character is included if the user has selected the special character option and entered a custom set.

Copy to Clipboard: Users can easily copy the generated password to their clipboard with a single click of the Copy button. After copying, a notification appears informing the user that the password has been successfully copied.

Password Refresh: A Refresh button allows users to generate a new password instantly with the current settings.
